meanings.sent1: She hollered for her friend to come over.
meanings.sent2: The coach hollered instructions to the players on the field.
meanings.sent3: The parrot hollered back at the noisy children.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm hollered its fury across the dark sky.
meanings.sent5: His hollered warning echoed through the empty hallway.

meanings.sent1: The hollered from the crowd could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent2: His hollered of joy filled the room with excitement.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected hollered interrupted the peaceful evening.
meanings.sent4: The hollered of the wind through the trees sounded eerie.
meanings.sent5: The hollered of the baby woke up the entire household.
